tweets.text: @SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL I‚Äôve officially asked the EA if the 4 monitoring stations can provide real time data feeds to local residents via a website. I see no reason why this isn‚Äôt already being done? Residents need this information to safeguard themselves given published instances above permitted levels

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg We ve had to leave out home tonight, no where to go, will happily sleep in car to sleep in fresh clean air, just don't know where we can go & park up safely for night, p,ease sort us a refuge @AaronBell4NUL we can't live in our homes. #stopthestink

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Nuisance abatement must happen immediately. The council has enough evidence to do this, the risk if no action is taken quickly is a desperate act by an individual or group against the Landfill site. Desperate people do desperate things. Council must act against the Nuisance !
@sunnyraisin62 @adamsharered @RedIndustries2 That‚Äôs @RedIndustries2 always giving back to the community https://t.co/htJuxU2uvz
@ClareDinnisEA if you think that this many people should suffer because on the inept @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency then you should be ashamed. We can‚Äôt breathe. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids Why is it always worse at weekend? This cannot be a coincidence, it's every weekend!

Not looking forward to @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill ‚Äòwind to change‚Äô tonight... Pray for Newcastle under Lyme @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StaffordshireCC @EnvAgencyMids amazed that‚Äôs it BAU as normal from Monday - absolute lunacy @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/kaFVeSz2GE

@hayulls @Lucy_Lapwing @LGSpace @Buzz_dont_tweet @DandelionAppre1 @Love_plants @wildflower_hour @WildFlowerSoc @BiodiversitySoS @MeadowInGarden @DaveGoulson @RewildingB A too common sight around #Banbury and in a play area too. And meanwhile we continue to be gassed in our own homes @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @BBCNews @panorama @stopthestink https://t.co/j5Gpwf1DKv
